fuck im so bored, this is taking so much effort but here goes...right im proboly gonna make a shitload of spellign errors cuz im sorta dozed out ...i had my barbecue fur rugby it wuz ok kinda boring SAW RUGBY MAN tee hee hes funny...school went by to fast, i hate babies. Gross i cant beleive im litaning to michelle branch, the lyrics are pretty good... i amaze myself..im confuzed, i dunno wut i feel, pms .. so im gonna piss off.

hah yeah well i got 3/30 on my math test ..fail fail fail.I just came back frum my physio apointment. elephant got a gram frum max lol, she didnt seem 2 happy though, right in the middle of math she wuz all embarassed.poor max it wuz all akward. I got a rosey, bright bright pink.wut else.. yeah thats all i have to go out with my dog may b ill think of something interesting to say when i get back.

i feel like writting but i dont kno wut to say..i feel like all the greatest quotes in the world have been stolen " life is a box of chocolates " - who said that anyway..forest gump lol "To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead." -Bertrand Russell "Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes." -Mahatma Gandhi *damn i wish i wuz as smart as him. "This isn't good or bad. It's just the way of things. Nothing stays the same." -Real Live Preacher "Electricity is actually made up of extremely tiny particles called electrons, that you cannot see with the naked eye unless you have been drinking." -Dave Barry i wonder if the people that said these quotes ever thought theyd b recognized fur wut they said.

three 3 names you go by: - roxie - rocksee - roxy 3 things you like about yourself: -im outgoing -hard working when i wanna b -flexibility (both) 3 things you hate about yourself: -i worry about what i look like - stubborn - i dont talk about stuff that bugs me 3 things you don't understand: - math - myself and other ppl - y life is so utterly unfair 3 things that annoy you: -poking hitting slapping -babies -bitchiness 3 things that scare you: -outliving my parents and friends -walking homa on dark nights -failing 3 of your everyday essentials: -black eyeliner -etnies shoes -mirror 3 of your fav bands: -rooney -the strokes -billy talent 3 of your fav songs: -rape me -californication -im shakin 3 people you spend most of your time with: -my parents -friends -ppl on the bus 3 things you can't do: -drive -fly -concentrate 3 things you want really bad right now: -cornuts -pina colada (cuban rum) - get on the bus and see wher it takes me 3 future careers: - plastic surgeon - artist wud b ideal - teacher 3 places you'd like to go on vacation: - alabama -hawaii -greece 3 things you want to do before you die: -own a horse - fall in love - fly

mood: inspired and very lazy i hate myself right now i wish i could study.I wish i could get drunk and pass out, then wake up the next morning and not care what i looked like. I really shud study fur math...but i cant i dont have enough will power fur it i guess.I understand nothing in school xcept fur may b fine arts,.. lucky me im in foods.. Why do we do things we dont beleive in..every time i have a birthday cake, see a shooting star i wish, not one of these wishes come true, and every time i feel dissapointed, but i still do it, this scares me do i not learn frum the mistakes i make...? Y do i collect bottles and put them in front of window, and those jones bottle caps " stop smoking"..right. I hate having high expectations, but i always do. I hate when people dont keep theyre promises. I hate my parents. I hate not ever going to disneyland. I hate fairy tales but i like happy endings. I hate hating. i hate myself sometimes.I hate when after a shitty day your walking home and rain starts stabbing at your fucking back.I hate having a curfew. i hate moodswings. I hate wasting time on sleeping.I hate holding on to things. I hate not being able to admit things. I hate not knowing how i feel. Melancholy smells like the smoke coming from my blow out birthday candels. its exactly then when i feel a little part of me dissapear. forever.

Please come now I think I'm falling I'm holding to all I think is safe It seems I found the road to nowhere And I'm trying to escape I yelled back when I heard thunder But I'm down to one last breath And with it let me say Let me say Hold me now I'm six feet from the edge and I'm thinking That maybe six feet Ain't so far down

wuts there to say.. my parents are fucked up, dad got all his equipment and hes got the wrong kinda insurance..whoopie..so hes all stressed and shit..he wants to send me to a counsellor ...my mum wishes she had never given birth to me..but shes moving out soon..i really wanna stop caring bout -trace-(chichi new word) but i cant...i cant. So please come stay with me 'Cause I still believe there's something left for you and me For you and me For you and me Hold me now I'm six feet from the edge and I'm thinking........
